item.title: Data efficiency of classification strategies for chemical and materials design
item.description:
Quinn Gallagher, Michael Webb, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4404961437
We benchmark the performance of space-filling and active learning algorithms on classification problems in materials science, revealing trends in optimally data-efficient algorithms.
item.author: Quinn Gallagher, Michael Webb

item.title: A Materials Discovery Framework Based on Conditional Generative Models Applied to the Design of Polymer Electrolytes
item.description:
Arash Khajeh, X. L. Lei, Weike Ye, Zhenze Yang, Linda Hung, Daniel Schweigert, Ha-Kyung Kwon, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4404984467
In this work, we introduce a computational polymer discovery framework that efficiently designs polymers with tailored properties. The framework comprises three core components—--a conditioned generative model, a computational evaluation module,...
item.author: Arash Khajeh, X. L. Lei, Weike Ye, Zhenze Yang, Linda Hung, Daniel Schweigert, Ha-Kyung Kwon

item.title: Scientific Exploration with Expert Knowledge (SEEK) in Autonomous Scanning Probe Microscopy with Active Learning
item.description:
Utkarsh Pratiush, Hiroshi Funakubo, Rama K. Vasudevan, Sergei V. Kalinin, Yongtao Liu, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405002930
Microscopy techniques have played vital roles in materials science, biology, and nanotechnology, offering high-resolution imaging and detailed insights into properties at nanoscale and atomic level. The automation of microscopy experiments,...
item.author: Utkarsh Pratiush, Hiroshi Funakubo, Rama K. Vasudevan, Sergei V. Kalinin, Yongtao Liu
